actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize an exchange of properties between the United States and Tuskegee University relating to the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, Alabama, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey property known as Grey Columns to the Tuskegee University, Alabama, if specified conditions are met. Authorizes the Secretary to accept an easement from the University for the administration of the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an exchange of properties between the United States and Tuskegee University relating to the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, Alabama, and for other purposes.
